mapper.sql: um.id,um.menu_code as menuCode,title,path,parent_code as parentCode,menu_type as menuType,order_number as orderNumber,level_number as levelNumber,icon, name,redirect,component,is_valid as isValid,relate_flow as relateFlow,no_drop_down as noDropDown,keep_alive as keepAlive,hidden,is_home as isHome, path_routing as pathRouting,is_able as isAble,is_approve as isApprove,ur.auth_menu_code as authMenuCode,ur.com_button as comButton,ur.detail_button as detailButton
mapper.select:
select
from uq_function_menu um left join uq_button_routing ur on um.menu_code = ur.menu_code where 1=1 and um.menu_code not in (0,-2,-1,22,2) and is_valid = 1 order by order_number

select
from uq_function_menu um left join uq_button_routing ur on um.menu_code = ur.menu_code where 1=1 and um.menu_code = #{menuCode} order by order_number

select
from uq_function_menu where 1=1 and menu_code = #{menuCode} or title = #{title}
select count(1) as countSize from uq_function_menu where 1=1
mapper.delete: delete from uq_function_menu where 1=1 and menu_code not in (0,-2,-1,22,2)
mapper.select: select parent_code as parentCode,level_number as levelNumber from uq_function_menu where 1=1 and menu_code = #{parentCode}
mapper.delete: delete from uq_function_menu_button where 1=1 and menu_code = #{menuCode}
mapper.select: select menu_code as menuCode,authority_button_code as authorityButtonCode from uq_function_menu_button where 1=1
select max(order_number) + 1 as orderNumber from uq_function_menu where 1=1
